content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>

Isabelle Workshop 2022

Where: remotely + locally (hybrid) in Haifa, associated with FLoC 2022.

When: 11-Aug-2022 (timezone of Haifa: GMT+3)

Paper submission deadline: 15-May-2022
Notification of acceptance: 13-Jun-2022

Organisers: Tobias Nipkow, Larry Paulson, Makarius Wenzel

See https://sketis.net/isabelle/isabelle-workshop-2022 for further details,
including the Easychair submission page.
